resources.string: Get a toast popup when a quick tap was recognised.

The quick tap options bundled with the latest Pixel 6 devices running Android 12 are limited. This app provides a couple more desirable options. Simply set this app as the app to run in the Quick Tap settings. To access this menu again, and change the QTExtended behaviour, long-press the app icon and click "Settings". You will have to close this settings activity down to get it working.
